resources.string: Do you accept to delete all notes?

"Quick Note is a free and full-featured note-taking app.It's created by Olmos Davronov and designed for without the need for a monthly subscription.
Quick Note is incredibly freeform when it comes to taking quick, short-cut notes. Each Note has a functionality to restore itself after deleting in trash section. Also task based functionalities has been added for benefit that is basically where you can add any kind of note or a task you like, anywhere you want. This means all remindable information is kept in your single device."
